insights.populationGrowth: Moderate 1.6% with UNESCO World Heritage tourism driving economy.
insights.educationLevel: High 84% literacy due to tourism development and cultural importance.
insights.housingPattern: UNESCO-protected traditional 40%, modern tourist facilities 35%, residential 25%.

insights.precipitation: High 1,700mm with Mekong and Nam Khan river flooding.
insights.extremeEvents: Heritage site flooding risks, tourist season weather, river level variations.

recentDisasters.impact: Historic temples flooded, tourism severely affected

economicProfile.gdpContribution: 15.8% of national GDP - highest tourism contribution
economicProfile.businessEnvironment: World Heritage tourism economy, cultural preservation, international visitor destination
